opportunityTitle: City of Dallas — Enterprise Records / Document Management Modernization (CIP FY2026 programming)

issuingBody.name: City of Dallas — Office of Budget & Procurement Services / City Secretary (Records)

source.documentName: City of Dallas — Financial Transparency / Current Budget (CIP & IT program lines)

summary: City of Dallas FY2026 CIP/budget pages and City Secretary records pages show capital programming for enterprise records/document management modernization and digitization. No active solicitation or award listed on procurement portal at verification; procurement expected to be posted to the City's procurement/Bonfire portal when advertised.

opportunityTitle: Dallas County — Court & Justice Records Management Modernization (FY2026 programming)

issuingBody.name: Dallas County — Court Administration / IT / Purchasing

source.documentName: Dallas County — FY2026 Budget and Budget-in-brief resources (Office of Budget & Evaluation)

summary: Dallas County FY2026 budget documents and departmental planning show funds for modernizing court and justice records (eFile, case management integrations, digital storage). No active solicitation posted on the County Purchasing landing at time of check; procurement expected through Dallas County Purchasing.

Good fit for sensor integrators, telemetry vendors, and systems integrators.

opportunityTitle: Tyler Technologies — Potential subcontracting scope for municipal ERP (Munis) migrations in Texas (targeting 2026–2028 implementations)

issuingBody.name: Tyler Technologies — Public Sector Sales / Partner Opportunities

source.documentName: Tyler Technologies — News & Solutions (Tyler Munis / ERP references)

summary: Tyler is a dominant municipal ERP vendor (Munis) and frequently issues RFP responses and partners with systems integrators for local government ERP implementations. Given the wave of ERP/finance/HR projects programmed across Tier‑1 agencies, there will be subcontracting opportunities for implementation partners and data migration specialists. Monitor Tyler partner pages and local agency Tyler solicitations.

adHoc.note: Monitor press releases and agency ERP solicitations for subcontracting leads

opportunityTitle: Carahsoft / Cloud & SaaS Resellers — anticipated DIR/cooperative cloud procurements for Tier‑1 agencies (2026–2028)

issuingBody.name: Carahsoft — Public Sector Reseller / Contract Vehicles

summary: Carahsoft is a major reseller on DIR and federal cooperative contracting vehicles; upcoming municipal cloud/ERP migrations and cybersecurity procurements are likely to use reseller vehicles — opportunities for subcontracting systems integrators and professional services vendors exist. Monitor agency DIR-based solicitations and Carahsoft partner notices.
